Tomes\" (volume number). 4) Fixed \"8v6\" to \"8vo\" (octavo format). 5) Corrected \"Lipf.\" to \"Lips.\" (Leipzig). 6) Fixed \"Eyusd.\" to \"Ejusd.\" (Ejusdem = of the same author). 7) Changed \"fct.\" to \"Act.\" (Acts). 8) Added missing FORMAT tag for fourth book. 9) Fixed \"Jen√§\" to \"Jena\" (city). 10) Corrected \"4t√≤\" to \"4to\" (quarto format). 11) Fixed \"Lipf.\" to \"Lips.\" 12) Added missing opening quote for TITLE \"in Pentateuch...\". 13) Replaced \"&\" with \"&\" for proper XML encoding. 14) Fixed \"Frantz√∂sischer\" to \"Frantzösischer\" (French). 15) Added FORMAT tag for the atlas."}
